text_block_list.text: One day in the evening. Passing by the river bank on the way home from shopping――
With an astounding sharpness, a loud voice rang out. Surprised, I came to a stop. Without thinking, I looked in the direction it came from――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Suuu――………… Fuuー…………。
choice_data_list: If I'm not mistaken, she's…… Yaeno Muteki……？

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――Fuu! ……Haaa! ……Seii! ……Taaa!
In the evening air, her fighting spirit cut through the air as each swing of her fist, each kick, and each slash, caused the ground to shake――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …………Fuuu.
……before I realized it, I was captivated. She was the epitome of fierceness and serenity. Every part of her body moved with a refined grace, the result of diligent training……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――Excuse me. You over there.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Judging by the badge on your collar, I assume you are a trainer from the academy. Do you have some business with me?
choice_data_list: Not really…… sorry, I was just fascinated……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That's…… no, someone as inexperienced as I is undeserving of such praise.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Even now, I'm performing these 『Kata』 to purge my idle thoughts, to calm the uncontrollable emotions coursing through me in prepartion for tomorrow's Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However, even if my training has been insufficient, tomorrow I intend to use my full power. ……if you have the time, and find yourself there, it would be fortuitous.
Somehow, she gave off the impression of an old-timey martial artist with her speech and conduct, unconciously it caused me to straighten up and respond in kind.
Thereupon, they appeared――！！

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Oi oi oi oi！ Looks like we've got a little bit of a problem here, Tracen Academy missy！ This here's our 『Turf』, you know～！？

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: If you wanna pass through, I guess we'll have to extract a 『Toll』 from ya～！！
Suddenly, what seemed to be some illーtempered Uma Musume appeared……！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… your 『Turf』, you say? If I recall correctly, I believe this place is considered a part of the riverside park, is it not？

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Shut yer trap～～～！ Don't get smart with me！！ Aneki, this pinhead is gettin' kinda mouthy！！

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: ……how brave of you. But that spirit, how long will it last? If you don't wanna get hurt, you should probably do what we say―― run―crazed missy.
The delinquent Uma Musume that looked like the leader started releasing an intimidating aura！ ……since it's come this far I can't stand here and do nothing！！
choice_data_list: You all need to stop this……！
You all need to stop this……！

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Huuuh！？ Who the hell are you？ Don't order me around――！
With that one sharp voice from Yaeno Muteki, the delinquent Uma Musume froze in place as if they were struck by lightning……！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Well then. ……――do you still wish to continue？
The air fell completely silent, like the tranquil surface of water―― however, there was something unfathomable hidden behind her words. Then……

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: ……Let's go. She's out of our league.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Eh, huh, Aneki！？ W-wait for meee～～～！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……while it was for the purpose of chasing them off, I apologize for suddenly letting out such a loud voice. I'm sure you were surprised.
choice_data_list: No, I'm grateful for your help

text_block_list.text: Besides, while she had enough ferocity to freeze those delinquents in their tracks, seeing her so calmy stand there without flinching――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……much obliged.
Just what kind of run would she show off at the race？ With high expectations in mind, we parted ways.
And then, the next day. While carrying those expectations in my heart, when I went to see the Selection Race Yaeno Muteki was entering――

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Super Creek's run just now, it was wonderful wasn't it……！？ There already seems to be a certain presence about her.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap too…… the title of "Monster" certainly seems to fit her. She's still a little rough but, you can't say that there's no potential.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: There seem to be a lot of girls with very promising futures, too…… it seems there will be quite a few future champions from this generation.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… Me too…… this time for sure, I must get results. I must show the results of my training with a victory I can be proud of, this time for sure……！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: …… ……Alright, right here―― Haaaaaaa！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ！！ …… I wont…… let you……！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――OooooooooOOOOOo！！

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, she took the bait……！

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Yaeno Muteki…… she fell for it, huh. Her emotions are too easy to read. Like that, her legs won't last until the end.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Yeah, 『Again』 it seems…… I had been considering her but, as long as she isn't able to fix that habit, it'll be rough……
……it was a strange sight. Yesterday she had shown me her fierce spirit, calm bearing, and serene demeanor, but today Yaeno Muteki――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Just like this…… I'll push… through……！！ Haaaaaaaaa！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… haaa, haaa……！！
It just seemed like she was being flung about by the fierce and violent emotions overflowing from within as she ran, she was made to suffer defeat……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa……！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Kuu…… again, I…… once again……！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Immature！ Too much so……I'm too immature！！ For the sake of controlling this 『Ardent Flame』 within me, I need more……！
In that profile there was an excessive amount of regret…… I was unable to call out and stop Yaeno Muteki as she departed.
